mapper.insert: INSERT INTO express_agent(express_id, order_item_id, express_no, sender_name, sender_phone, sender_address, receiver_name, receiver_phone, receiver_address, description, goods_name, block_flag, create_time) VALUES (#{expressId}, #{item.orderItemId}, #{expressNumber}, #{senderName}, #{senderPhone}, #{senderAddress}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPhone}, #{receiverAddress}, #{description}, #{goodsName}, #{blockFlag}, #{createAt})

INSERT INTO express_customer(express_id, customer_order_id, express_no, sender_name, sender_phone, sender_address, receiver_name, receiver_phone, receiver_address, description, goods_name, block_flag, create_time) VALUES (#{expressId}, #{order.orderId}, #{expressNumber}, #{senderName}, #{senderPhone}, #{senderAddress}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPhone}, #{receiverAddress}, #{description}, #{goodsName}, #{blockFlag}, #{createAt})

INSERT INTO express_application(express_id, event_order_id, express_no, sender_name, sender_phone, sender_address, receiver_name, receiver_phone, receiver_address, description, goods_name, block_flag, create_time) VALUES (#{expressId}, #{eventOrder.orderId}, #{expressNumber}, #{senderName}, #{senderPhone}, #{senderAddress}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPhone}, #{receiverAddress}, #{description}, #{goodsName}, #{blockFlag}, #{createAt})
mapper.select: SELECT order_item_id, order_item_status, goods_quantity, order_item_price,order_id, block_flag, create_time FROM order_item WHERE order_item_id = #{orderItemId}
SELECT order_id, agent_id, block_flag, create_time FROM `order` WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND block_flag = 0
